name: First Financial Corporation
description: First Financial Corporation is a community-focused financial institution headquartered in Terre Haute, Indiana. Established in 1834, the company has a rich history of providing a range of financial services to individuals and businesses in the Wabash Valley and beyond. Through its banking subsidiary, First Financial Bank, the corporation offers a variety of services including personal banking, business banking, loans, mortgages, and investment services. The bank is dedicated to meeting the financial needs of its customers with personalized service and a commitment to community involvement. With a focus on innovation and technology, First Financial Corporation strives to enhance customer experience through digital banking solutions while maintaining a strong local presence. The company is also recognized for its efforts in supporting local charities and initiatives, reflecting its mission to improve the quality of life in the communities it serves. As a publicly traded entity on the NASDAQ, First Financial Corporation continues to expand its footprint while upholding its legacy of trust and reliability.

seo.meta_description: Explore First Financial Corporation, a leading financial institution offering a range of banking and investment services. Committed to community and innovation.

faq.question: What services does First Financial Corporation offer?
faq.answer: First Financial Corporation offers personal banking, business banking, loans, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of First Financial Corporation?
faq.answer: Norman L. Lowery is the CEO of First Financial Corporation.

faq.question: Where is First Financial Corporation headquartered?
faq.answer: First Financial Corporation is headquartered in Terre Haute, Indiana, USA.

faq.question: When was First Financial Corporation founded?
faq.answer: First Financial Corporation was founded in 1834.
